column4: Are there any ways to force UBuntu to detect the displays trough a terminal command?
what are you trying to do
I have a Laptop with a broken screen, and I just installed Ubuntu in it
But it does not recognize my external display
So, im trying to force it to recognize it, so I can check the Mirror displays...
and how did you install ubuntu if you can't see anything
I can see, but with my external display
It is a Compaq Presario F700, with an integrated GeForce Go 6100

I installed it with my external display. Everything goes fine, but when Ubuntu boots, it just goes to black, while I can see a little on my broken screen, because there is a little part that is still fine
